article: Once there was a father and a son. They were ill-tempered and never gave way to  _  One day the father  _  to ask some friends to dinner in his house. He  _  his son to buy some meat in town. When the son walked to the town gate, a man was coming from the outside. The gate wasn't  _  enough to let two men in and out at the same time. But neither of them  _  give way to the other. They stood face to face inside the gate hour after hour. But the father was worried."What  _  I do? My son hasn't come yet. I can't wait any more." He wanted to know what the  _  with his son was. So he left his friends at home, and went to town  to look for  his son."You may first take the  _  home for my friends. Let me  _  here against him instead of you." He said to his son when he knew what had happened.
